;AAEA;EACE,iBAAiB;AACnB;;AAEA;EACE,mBAAmB;AACrB;;AAEA;EACE,eAAe;EACf,gBAAgB;EAChB,0BAA0B;AAC5B;;AAEA,sBAAsB;AACtB;EACE;;IAEE,0BAA0B;IAC1B,SAAS;EACX;;EAEA;IACE,gBAAgB;IAChB,SAAS;EACX;;EAEA;IACE,gBAAgB;EAClB;;EAEA;IACE,0BAA0B;IAC1B,SAAS;EACX;;EAEA;IACE,gBAAgB;EAClB;AACF;;AAEA;EACE;IACE,oBAAoB;IACpB,8BAA8B;EAChC;;EAEA;IACE,0BAA0B;EAC5B;;EAEA;IACE,SAAS;EACX;;EAEA;;IAEE,SAAS;EACX;;EAEA;IACE,sBAAsB;IACtB,kBAAkB;EACpB;;EAEA;IACE,sBAAsB;EACxB;AACF;;AAEA;EACE;IACE,sBAAsB;IACtB,oBAAoB;EACtB;;EAEA;IACE,WAAW;EACb;;EAEA;;IAEE,mBAAmB;EACrB;;EAEA;IACE,2DAA2D;EAC7D;AACF",sourcesContent:['/* Home Page Styles */
.home-page {
  padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.hero-section {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 60px 0 80px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #ffffff 100%);
  margin: -20px -20px 60px -20px;
  border-radius: 0 0 var(--radius-xl) var(--radius-xl);
}

.hero-content {
  margin-bottom: 48px;
}

.search-section {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.categories-section,
.bundles-section {
  margin-bottom: 64px;
}

.section-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 48px;
}

/* Search Bar Styles */
.search-bar-container {
  position: relative;
}

.search-bar {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items: center;
  background: white;
  padding: 4px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.search-input-wrapper {
  flex: 1;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.search-icon {
  position: absolute;
  left: 16px;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  z-index: 1;
}

.search-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 14px 16px 14px 48px;
  border: none;
  background: none;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}

.search-input::placeholder {
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.search-input:focus {
  outline: none;
}

.filter-toggle {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 12px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.filter-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--background-light);
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.search-button {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 14px 28px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.search-button:hover {
  background: var(--accent-hover);
}

/* Quick Filters */
.quick-filters {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: 20px;
  margin-top: 12px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.quick-filters-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.clear-filters {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.quick-filters-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(180px, 1fr));
  gap: 16px;
}

.filter-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 6px;
}

.filter-group label {
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.filter-group select,
.filter-group input {
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 14px;
}

.filter-group select:focus,
.filter-group input:focus {
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
  outline: none;
}

/* Search Suggestions Dropdown */
.search-suggestions {
  position: absolute;
  top: calc(100% + 8px);
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
  max-height: 400px;
  overflow-y: auto;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.suggestion-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  padding: 12px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s ease;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.suggestion-item:last-child {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.suggestion-item:hover {
  background: var(--background-light);
}

.suggestion-image {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  overflow: hidden;
  background: var(--background-light);
}

.suggestion-image img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.suggestion-image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.suggestion-image-placeholder i {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
}

.suggestion-details {
  flex: 1;
  min-width: 0;
}

.suggestion-name {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 4px;
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.suggestion-meta {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.suggestion-brand {
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.suggestion-separator {
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.suggestion-price {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.suggestion-category {
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  background: var(--background-light);
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  text-transform: capitalize;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.suggestions-loading {
  padding: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
}

/* Category Card Styles */
.category-card {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: 32px 24px;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.category-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.category-card:hover .category-arrow {
  transform: translateX(4px);
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.category-icon {
  width: 64px;
  height: 64px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-color), var(--accent-hover));
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  color: white;
}

.category-icon [data-feather] {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
}

.category-name {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.category-description {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
}

.category-arrow {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 20px;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/* Product Card Styles */
.product-card {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
}

.product-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.product-card:hover .product-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
}

.product-card:hover .card-hover-indicator {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateX(0);
}

.product-image {
  position: relative;
  height: 200px;
  background: var(--background-light);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.product-image img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.image-placeholder {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  gap: 8px;
}

.image-placeholder [data-feather] {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
}

.product-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(229, 199, 126, 0.9), rgba(212, 181, 108, 0.9));
  padding: 12px;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

.quick-action-button {
  background: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 8px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  color: var(--accent-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.product-info {
  padding: 20px;
}

.product-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.product-name {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.product-price {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.product-details {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.product-brand {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.color-info {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
}

.color-name {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.color-swatch {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px var(--border-color);
}

.product-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.tag {
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.category-tag {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: white;
}

.occasion-tag {
  background: var(--background-light);
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.pattern-tag {
  background: #e3f2fd;
  color: #1976d2;
}

.product-actions {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.card-hover-indicator {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  right: 20px;
  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(20px);
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

/* Bundle Card Styles */
.bundle-card {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
}

.bundle-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-medium);
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
}

.bundle-card:hover .bundle-overlay {
  opacity: 1;
}

.bundle-image {
  position: relative;
  height: 240px;
  background: var(--background-light);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.bundle-image img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.bundle-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 12px;
  right: 12px;
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

.action-button {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  border: none;
  padding: 8px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  cursor: pointer;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
}

.action-button:hover {
  background: white;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.action-button.saved {
  color: #e91e63;
}

.bundle-info {
  padding: 24px;
}

.bundle-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: flex-start;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.bundle-title {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.bundle-price {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.bundle-description {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.5;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.bundle-items {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.items-preview {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 6px;
}

.item-preview {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.item-name {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.item-price {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.more-items {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  font-style: italic;
}

.bundle-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.bundle-tags .tag {
  font-size: 11px;
}

.occasion-tag {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: white;
}

.style-tag {
  background: #f3e5f5;
  color: #7b1fa2;
}

.season-tag {
  background: #e8f5e8;
  color: #388e3c;
}

.bundle-score {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.score-bar {
  width: 100%;
  height: 4px;
  background: var(--border-color);
  border-radius: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.score-fill {
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--accent-color);
  transition: width 0.3s ease;
}

.score-text {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.bundle-actions {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.action-group {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

/* Bundle Products Grid */
.bundle-products-grid {
  position: relative;
  height: 240px;
  background: var(--background-light);
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.bundle-product-item {
  position: relative;
  background: white;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.bundle-product-item img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.bundle-product-item:hover img {
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

.product-placeholder {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: var(--background-light);
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.product-placeholder i {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
}

.product-label {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.7), transparent);
  color: white;
  padding: 8px 6px 4px;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-transform: capitalize;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Filter Panel Styles */
.filter-panel {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: 20px;
  height: fit-content;
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.filter-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 12px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.filter-header h3 {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin: 0;
}

.filter-header-actions {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.clear-all {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--accent-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.collapse-toggle {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 4px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.collapse-toggle:hover {
  background: var(--background-light);
}

.filter-content {
  max-height: none;
  overflow: visible;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.filter-content.collapsed {
  max-height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.filter-group {
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.filter-label {
  display: block;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.filter-input,
.filter-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px 12px;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 14px;
  background: white;
}

.filter-input:focus,
.filter-select:focus {
  border-color: var(--accent-color);
  outline: none;
}

.price-range {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.price-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 10px 12px;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 14px;
}

.price-separator {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
}

.color-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(80px, 1fr));
  gap: 12px;
}

.color-option {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 8px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  transition: background-color 0.2s ease;
}

.color-option:hover {
  background: var(--background-light);
}

.color-option input[type="radio"] {
  display: none;
}

.color-swatch {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px var(--border-color);
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.any-color {
  background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ccc 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(-45deg, #ccc 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 75%, #ccc 75%), linear-gradient(-45deg, transparent 75%, #ccc 75%);
  background-size: 4px 4px;
  background-position: 0 0, 0 2px, 2px -2px, -2px 0px;
}

.any-color span {
  font-size: 8px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

.color-check {
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  color: white;
}

.color-label {
  font-size: 11px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  text-align: center;
}

.active-filters {
  border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
  padding-top: 16px;
  margin-top: 16px;
}

.active-filters h4 {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.filter-tags {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 6px;
}

.filter-tag {
  background: var(--background-light);
  color: var(--text-primary);
  padding: 4px 8px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 12px;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
}

.remove-filter {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--text-muted);
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.remove-filter:hover {
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

/* Search Page Styles */
.search-page {
  padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.search-header {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}

.results-header {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
  text-align: center;
}

.results-title {
  font-size: 28px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.search-query,
.category-filter {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.search-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr;
  gap: 32px;
  align-items: start;
}

.filters-sidebar {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
}

.results-section {
  min-height: 400px;
}

/* Product Detail Page Styles */
.product-detail-page {
  padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.product-detail {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 48px;
  margin-top: 32px;
}

.product-image-section {
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
  height: fit-content;
}

.product-image-section .product-image {
  height: 500px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  overflow: hidden;
  background: var(--background-light);
}

.product-info-section {
  padding: 20px 0;
}

.product-header {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
}

.product-title {
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.category-badge {
  background: var(--accent-color);
  color: white;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.product-details {
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.detail-group {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
}

.detail-group h3 {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.detail-grid {
  display: grid;
  gap: 12px;
}

.detail-item {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 120px 1fr;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 8px 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.detail-label {
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
}

.detail-value {
  color: var(--text-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
}

.detail-value.price {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--accent-color);
}

.product-description {
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.product-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 16px;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

/* Recommendation Page Styles */
.recommendation-page {
  padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.selected-product-section {
  background: var(--background-light);
  border-radius: var(--radius-xl);
  padding: 32px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.selected-product {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 32px;
}

.selected-product .product-image {
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  overflow: hidden;
  background: white;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.selected-product .product-info h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.selected-product .product-details {
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
}

.recommendations-header {
  text-align: center;
}

.page-title {
  font-size: 36px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-primary);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.page-subtitle {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: var(--text-secondary);
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.recommendations-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 280px 1fr;
  gap: 32px;
  align-items: start;
}

.filters-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.filters-header h3 {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

.recommendations-section {
  min-height: 400px;
}

.recommendations-header-inline {
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.recommendations-header-inline h3 {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--text-primary);
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .search-content,
  .recommendations-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 24px;
  }

  .filters-sidebar {
    position: static;
    order: -1;
  }

  .filter-panel {
    position: static;
  }

  .product-detail {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 32px;
  }

  .product-image-section {
    position: static;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .hero-section {
    padding: 40px 0 60px;
    margin: -20px -16px 40px -16px;
  }

  .quick-filters-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .categories-grid {
    gap: 16px;
  }

  .bundles-grid,
  .products-grid {
    gap: 16px;
  }

  .selected-product {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .product-actions {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .search-bar {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .search-button {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .bundle-card,
  .product-card {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }

  .color-grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(60px, 1fr));
  }
}
